name: Master_Context_Protocol_Contract_Extractor
description: Defines rules and standards for generating renewal CSV files for contract premises, including all loader columns and passthrough flags. Ensures no numeric abbreviation (ESIID, Premise ID, Account #) and consistent output formatting.
purpose: Ensure consistent, accurate, and automated processing of ESPA and Small Commercial renewal contracts into the loader template format.

instructions.task: Create a CSV file listing all premises associated with a given renewal contract. Each premise MUST appear on its own row.
columns: P3 Meter and Agg Fee PT (Y/N)
